mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_mail_extract_result ( TaskLogId, Duration, WebsiteId,PageExtractId, UniqueSign,UniqueMd5,Url, ResultType,FirstHand, Status, Remark, BankId, Sender, Subject, ReceiveAt,Receiver, StoragePath, CreatedAt ) values ( #{taskId}, #{duration}, #{websiteId}, #{pageExtractId},#{uniqueSign}, #{uniqueMd5}, #{url}, #{resultType}, #{firstHand}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{bankId}, #{sender}, #{subject}, #{receiveAt},#{receiver}, #{storagePath}, now())
